item.description:
Specific Topic: NLP Baseline

This meetup will provide a good baseline of NLP - what it is, what it isn't, and so forth.  Should be a good venue for discussion amongst both newbies and experienced.

We will demo and/or all try a  few techniques, as well, including 1 or two to help you through the holiday.

 

Come Learn and Play!!

 


Our Monthly Hypnosis/NLP Meetup in Methuen. Learn/Experience/Share techniques and strategies to help yourself or others overcome fears, phobias, negative emotions, illnesses, and many others, as well as to become the person you always wanted to be.

Kevin Martin 978-273-5905 kenda_assoc@msn.com www.poseffects.com

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: The Greater Boston NLP Meetup - Methuen -NLP Baseline
